import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Bot extends Component { componentDidMount() { const chatbotButton = document.getElementById('chatbotButton'); const bot = document.querySelector('.bot'); // Event listener for clicking the button chatbotButton.addEventListener('click', () => { // Toggle the visibility of the chatbot window bot.style.display = bot.style.display === 'none' ? 'block' : 'none'; }); } render() { return ( <>
